item.description: I'm going to visit a friend out here and thought I'd see if anyone is interested in a dog walk and icecream. Meet around 12 and chat, and do a light hike. Have something cold to drink and Icecream. Bring those doggies! This event will be sent out to 3 groups. Icecream stand is off of 146 Purgatory Chasm exit. Take a left at the stop sign and the stand is up the street on the right. Minature golf here too!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Purgatory Chasm Dog's and Icecream
